attributes.additional_details:
The 'voted in' government has not listened to its constituents and decided that they will overrule the peoples decision. A far-a-way London decision deciding over our health and environment. Will the politicians allow fracking in their own back yards?    
The local council and people living their voted against it. Democracy has been over looked. No more fossil fuels.
attributes.background: The government has overruled a decision which will allow Fracking on an opposed site. The people of the area, parish and council have all refused this action. Stop giving  our land and environment to dirty finite energy company's.  We said 'No'.
